sections.title: What Are Cookies?
sections.content:
Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us improve your experience, analyze site performance, and provide personalized content.
We use both session cookies (temporary) and persistent cookies (stored for a set period).

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
sections.content:
We use cookies to:
- Ensure our website functions properly.
- Analyze user behavior to improve our services.
- Remember your preferences, such as language settings.
- Deliver relevant content and advertisements.

sections.title: Your Consent
sections.content: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy. You can withdraw consent or manage cookies through your browser settings at any time.

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content:
